text: Anatoma rainesi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Anatomidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Pacific Ocean off Easter Island. ==References== * Geiger D. 2003. Phylogenetic assessment of characters proposed for the generic classification of Recent Scissurellidae (Gastropoda : Vetigastropoda) with a description of one new genus and six new species from Easter Island and Australia. Molluscan Research 23(1): 21-83 * Geiger D.L. (2012) Monograph of the little slit shells. Volume 1. Introduction, Scissurellidae. pp. 1-728. Volume 2. Anatomidae, Larocheidae, Depressizonidae, Sutilizonidae, Temnocinclidae. pp. 729–1291. Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History Monographs Number 7 ==External links== Category:Anatomidae Category:Gastropods described in 2003
title: Anatoma rainesi
